references: Related: CF 215959, CF 215251, Res 15947. Repealing Ord 80754, Ord 80755
summary: An ordinance relating to the Park Department making appropriations from the Seattle Park Improvement-State Development Fund, the Seattle Park Bonds 1948 Fund and the Cumulative Reserve Fund for construction of a giraffe-kangaroo house and for certain betterments at Woodland Park, contemplated by Resolution No. 15947 and repealing Ordinance Nos. 80754 and 80755.
committee: Finance and Parks and Public Grounds
